translations: n.<英>玉蜀黍，玉米；<美>印第安玉米（通常不食用，用于秋收庆典装饰）；黄色

sentences.sentence: Nine dans rice, eight sacks maizes, ten sacks coarse cereals.
sentences.translation: 米九石，玉蜀黍八袋，杂粮十袋。

sentences.sentence: Prevent and kill pests to create a good environment for maizes growth and development;
sentences.translation: 防虫治虫，为玉米创造良好生育环境；
